data.name: responsiveIframePCFControl_Display_Key
data.comment: Name of the control displayed on designer

data.name: responsiveIframePCFControl_Desc_Key
data.value: A PCF control to embed responsive iframes with custom permissions.
data.comment: Description of the control displayed on designer

data.name: Source_Display_Key
data.comment: Display name for the source property

data.name: Source_Desc_Key
data.value: The URL to load in the iframe.

data.name: IframeWidth_Display_Key
data.comment: Display name for the iframeWidth property

data.name: IframeWidth_Desc_Key
data.value: The CSS width of the iframe (e.g., 100%, 800px).

data.name: IframeHeight_Display_Key
data.comment: Display name for the iframeHeight property

data.name: IframeHeight_Desc_Key
data.value: The CSS height of the iframe (e.g., 100%, 600px).
